p: The accumulation of H 2O 2 in HD3086 (thermotolerant) during pollination stage was observed maximum (3.1 μM/g FW) under T2, whereas it was minimum during control condition ( Fig. 8b). Similarly, during grain-filling stage, the H 2O 2 accumulation was maximum (3.8 μM/g FW) under T 2. Significant (p ≤ 0.05) variations were observed in the accumulation of H 2O 2 at different stages of growth.
